falstad

Class StubOrder

  • java.lang.Object
    • falstad.MazeController
      • falstad.StubOrder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Order

    public class StubOrder
extends MazeController
implements Order
    This class has the task of creating an OrderStub that can be used in the MazeFactoryTest to test the order method in MazeFactory.
    Author:
    corythomas

    • Constructor Detail

      • StubOrder

        public StubOrder()
        This is the constructor for the StubOrder class. It sets all the fields to their default values. The default builder is DFS and the default skill level is 0.

      • isPerfect

        public boolean isPerfect()
        Description copied from interface: Order
        Describes if the ordered maze should be perfect, i.e. there are no loops and no isolated areas, which also implies that there are no rooms as rooms can imply loops
        Specified by:
        isPerfect in interface Order
        Overrides:
        isPerfect in class MazeController
        Returns:
        perfect This will tell whether the maze is perfect or not. A perfect maze has no loops and every cell is accessible from every other cell in the maze.

      • updateProgress

        public void updateProgress(int percentage)
        This calls the updateProgress method in the superclass so that the current percentage of the maze that has been generated will show up on the maze game screen.
        Specified by:
        updateProgress in interface Order
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
